node.title: Agriculture in Our Schools & Institutions Part 1
node.description: Many schools are awakening to the fact that agriculture is supposed to the A, B and C of our education. But the question is: “How do we do that?” AdAgra is committed to helping schools with this challenge and has formed a working group that is developing curriculum and a quick-start manual to meet this need. Join us to be inspired with ways to make agriculture a viable option at your school or institution.
